message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
I can do better than your 'generous' offer. Meet me in the middle.
The clock is ticking, Alice.  This is a fair offer considering the time pressure.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Let's try this.
Alice, we're running out of time!  This is practically a 50/50 split. Take it before inflation eats our profits!
